attributes.action: Re-instate the F1 doctors accommodation or increase their salary
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government has decided to abolish free accommodation for junior doctors.  They graduate with around £20,000 debt and now they will be out of pocket by around £5,000 pounds.  Please sign this petition if you agree that the government should re-instate free accommodation or an increase in salary
